price: 88. Dheh: Hadday dadku iyo jinku isugu tagaan inay la yimaadaan wax la mid ah Qur’aankan, ma la imaan karaan wax la mid ah, xataa hadduu qaarba qaarka kale caawiyo oo siiyo garab.
arabic: قُل لَّئِنِ ٱجۡتَمَعَتِ ٱلۡإِنسُ وَٱلۡجِنُّ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتُواْ بِمِثۡلِ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ لَا يَأۡتُونَ بِمِثۡلِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَانَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ لِبَعۡضٖ ظَهِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul la-ini ij'tamaʿati al-insu wal-jinu ʿalā an yatū bimith'li hādhā al-qur'āni lā yatūna bimith'lihi walaw kāna baʿḍuhum libaʿḍin ẓahīran
